definition: scroll/book/volume/chapter/examination paper/classifier for books, paintings: volume, scroll
to roll up/roll/classifier for small rolled things (wad of paper money, movie reel etc)
to roll (up)/to sweep up/to carry on/roll
to be drawn into/to be involved in
to engulf/to sweep/to carry away everything
lit. to return in a swirl of dust (idiom)/fig. to regroup and come back even stronger/to make a comeback
film/roll of film/also written 膠捲|胶卷

sentences.english: The gray underwear wadded over a belt says So what.
sentences.chinese: 内衣裤被卷在一根带子上，却说那又如何。

sentences.english: If I roll it up, my blanket can change into a pillow.
sentences.chinese: 如果我把它卷起来，我的毯子能变成一个枕头。

sentences.english: Just roll it up and have a bite, Amy.
sentences.chinese: 把饼卷起来，咬一口尝尝吧，埃米。

sentences.english: In the following example, a reel is composed by picture and sound
sentences.chinese: 下面的例子中，一个卷中包含了图像和声音。

sentences.english: It has taken a long time to wade through the 'incredible volume' of evidence.
sentences.chinese: 看完这一大卷“长篇累牍”的证词花费了很长的时间。

sentences.english: The VUJ8680-1/ZF is an iron core winding machine.
sentences.chinese: ZF是一款自动的卷铁芯机器。

sentences.english: In Volume I had 54 units discussing Zhou I.
sentences.chinese: 卷一计有54则，讨论《易经》的内容。

sentences.english: The wind was whipping waves of sleet across the pond.
sentences.chinese: 寒风卷着雨夹雪，在池塘上肆虐。

sentences.english: Stanford buys 100, 000 volumes a year — or 273 every day.
sentences.chinese: 斯坦福每年购买10万卷图书，也就是每天273卷。

sentences.english: Clear amniotic fluid coated the can of cinnamon rolls.
sentences.chinese: 蛋清流到了装肉桂卷的罐头上。

sentences.english: If you call a woman a dragon, you mean that she is fierce and unpleasant.
sentences.chinese: 是一种含有龙形象的卷草图案，又叫“卷草缠枝龙”。

sentences.english: Let's look at how to copy a logical volume to a different volume group. The steps involved are
sentences.chinese: 我们来看看如何将逻辑卷复制到另一个卷组。

sentences.english: Each of the drives is named as a physical volume.
sentences.chinese: 每个驱动器作为一个物理卷进行命名。

sentences.english: Some of these directories can be separated into their own volumes.
sentences.chinese: 其中一些目录可以放在它们自己的卷中。

sentences.english: The curtain frequency volume, volume as the world prosperity.
sentences.chinese: 幽帘频卷，卷尽了凡尘繁华。

sentences.english: Rip currents are so strong that they can carry swimmers away from shore before they know what's happening.
sentences.chinese: 强流来势凶猛，会在不知不觉问把游泳者卷走。
